text: Dušan Dragosavac (; 1 December 1919 – 21 December 2014) was a former Yugoslav politician. He was a Serb from Croatia. He was the Chairman of the League of Communists of Yugoslavia from 20 October 1981 until 20 June 1982. He died on 21 December 2014, aged 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * Dušan Dragosavac information Category:1919 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Yugoslavian communist politicians
title: Dušan Dragosavac
